reason: Immediate bearish price action, highlighted by Bitcoin tumbling to last week's lows and Ether plunging, indicates a markdown phase. Macro fears impacting tech and precious metals are spilling over into crypto. Coinbase's missed estimates suggest waning retail engagement. While long-term regulatory engagement (CFTC advisory group, Crypto PAC efforts) is positive, the short-term market sentiment is distinctly negative, warranting caution.
headlines: Crypto execs Armstrong, Garlinghouse among many named to U.S. CFTC advisory group
Coinbase misses Q4 estimates as transaction revenue falls below $1 billion
Bitcoin tumbles back near last week's lows as AI fears crush tech and precious metals plunge
Crypto PAC Fairshake seeks to force resistant Texas Democrat Al Green from U.S. House
Sharplink's Lubin and Chalom make their case for ether DATs as prices plunge
